Package org.wtc.eclipse.platform.conditions

Class Summary
AllEditorsClosedCondition Condition that waits until there is no active editor open in the current workbench page.
ButtonEnabledCondition A condition that checks the enabled state of a given button.
CheckboxSelectedCondition Condition for verifying a button of type check is checked.
ComboEnabledCondition A condition that checks the enabled state of a given text field.
ComboValueCondition  
DynamicMenuItemExistsCondition Just like a menu item exists condition, but don't fail if after the given number of millis because the menu may be a dynamic menu.
FileOpenCondition Condition that waits for the open editors to (not) contain an editor for the given file path.
JobExistsCondition JobExistsCondition - Condition that polls the eclipse job manager and tests if there are any running jobs.
JobsInFamilyExistCondition JobsInFamilyExistCondition - Condition that checks for jobs in the specified family.
MenuItemExistsCondition Some menu items are add/removed to menus based on selection and/or other conditions.
NoResourceChangedEventsCondition Condition that waits for incoming resource changed events to stop.
NoResourceChangedEventsCondition.StoppingResourceChangeEventListener Listens for resource changed events and knows how to remove itself as a resource change listener.
PerspectiveActiveCondition Wait until the perspective is active in the active window.
ProjectOpenCondition Condition that waits until the project with the given name has the given opened state.
RegexTitleShellCondition Like a regular ShellCondition that checks for modality and title, but use the expected title as a regex pattern.
TableItemCheckedCondition Condition to verify that the table item is checked.
TextEnabledCondition A condition that checks the enabled state of a given text field.
TextValueCondition Condition to verify that the given text field contains the expected text value.
TreeItemCheckedCondition TreeItemCheckedCondition - Condition that tests whether or not a given TreeItem's checked state is equal to the given expected state.
TreeItemExistsCondition Condition that searches the given tree for a tree item.
YieldingShellDisposedCondition Yields if the active shell does not match the widget on which we are waiting.
